response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I think it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its worth to you and its actual value to me, I am offering it to you for $120. This price reflects a fair compromise between its perceived value to you and its intrinsic value to me. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.", "product_price": 120}
